sources.name: RawYelpData
sources.script:
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		YelpId as string,
		Name as string,
		ReviewCount as integer,
		Rating as decimal(3,2),
		Category as string,
		SearchLocationCity as string,
		SearchLocationState as string,
		Price as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> RawYelpData

sinks.name: SinkToSQL
sinks.script:
AggregateReviewCountByRating sink(input(
		id as integer,
		ReviewCount as integer,
		Price as string,
		LocationWithPrice as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['RatingWithLocation']) ~> SinkToSQL
